review_blob: Aroma complesso di cioccolato e pungente di liquirizia e note di sherry. Al palato persiste lamaro e non  troppo corposa e sentore liquoroso nel finale che si confonde con lamaro del luppolo. Schiuma evanescente. Colore marrone scuro \ nero. Un amaro che scalda il retro del palato
beer_name: Foglie dErba Hot Night at the Village

review_blob: good summer drining, clear, amber ale with frothy, white foam. Good medium bitterness, medium body and bitter finish.
Bitter red beer good looking and tasting with lasting balanced bitterness and hopping aroma that is not over used. Good summer drinking
Drink it easily. Good flavour and lot of foam for a dark beer that you can drink easily
Bittery and lot of flowery aroma. American and Japanese hops. A beer with a very distinct character
Hop printed on the label and almost lasting in aftertaste. Blonde beer with a bitter ending.

Surely an interresting brewery, the Apollo is a hoppy beer, brewed with 3 or 4 different hops; a bit complicated and you cannot drink it smoothly but you have to sip it carefully. Very rich and fruity aroma. I like it but I prefer the Japa one from the same brewery.
Strong golden beef vero light in colour with a thick head. Sweet after taste, to drink slowly
